wikimedia-privacypage: {{notranslate}} Default Wikimedia projects link to privacy policy. Should only be changed at the request of Wikimedia Foundation's Legal Department.
wikimedia-privacypage-labs: {{notranslate}} Default Wikimedia Labs projects link to terms of use. Should only be changed at the request of Wikimedia Foundation's Legal Department.
wikimedia-cookiestatement-page: {{notranslate}} Default link to Wikimedia Foundation cookie statement for the footer on all Wikimedia Foundation sites.
wikimedia-oathauth-notifications-recover: {{notranslate}} Default contact email address to use if 2FA recovery codes were generated for a user, when user does not recognize the action. Has to be a valid URL, including protocol
wikimedia-oathauth-recover-email-text-si: {{notranslate}} Default contact email address to use if 2FA recovery codes were generated for a user, when user does not recognize the action
